body.name: Blahoo Lightweight Baby Stroller,Travel Stroller for Airplane,Foldable Compact,5-Point Safety,One Hand Fold,Canopy&Storage Basket,0-36 Months,Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 27 - 28. Order within 7 hrs 25 mins.
features: ❤Lightweight and durable: This small, fully functional stroller is super light, weighing just 15 Lbs. The lightweight design makes traveling easier. The durable aluminum frame extends the life of the stroller.Under the sleeping basket is a large storage basket, which can hold a lot of things.

❤ Easy folding:The stroller folds easily and unrolls in just 3 seconds, with a double lock that automatically locks without falling apart. Great for traveling, on crowded streets or in storage Spaces.The handrail is a PU leather handrail, which is easy cleaning and is not easy to accumulate bacteria, giving the baby a safe environment.

❤Shock absorption:In any terrain can be smooth implementation, front wheel and rear wheel built-in damping spring, damping effect is good.The front wheel with damping spring can rotate 360 degrees. The rear wheel has a brake, you can quickly control it by stepping on it with your foot.

❤Protection sides:Five-point adjustable length safety belt, soft shoulder can provide comfortable and well protect the baby's safety. The canopy helps the baby protect from UV sunshine, and there is a skylight net on the canopy, so that the mother can see the baby's condition in the car.

❤The breathable fabric:It adopts breathable Lycra cloth with bird eyes, which is comfortable and soft and does not rub the baby's delicate skin. It can sit or sleep, which is convenient for the baby to fall asleep.The stroller is suitable for baby from birth to 3 years old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for on-the-go Parents!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this compact stroller and I must say it exceeded my expectations in every way. The first thing that caught my attention was how easy it was to fold and unfold. With just a simple pull of a lever, the stroller collapsed effortlessly into a compact size, making it extremely convenient for travel and storage.Not only is the folding mechanism a breeze to use, but the stroller itself is also incredibly lightweight, making it easy to maneuver and transport. Whether I'm navigating through crowded streets or maneuvering around tight corners, this stroller handles like a dream.But what really sets this compact stroller apart is its aesthetic appeal. The sleek design and modern color options make it a stylish choice for any parent. It's not only functional but also adds a touch of sophistication to my outings with my little one.Aside from the impressive features and design, the customer service provided by the company has been exceptional. They were responsive, helpful, and went above and beyond to ensure my satisfaction. From answering my pre-purchase questions to resolving a minor issue I had, their dedication to customer service was truly commendable.Overall, I highly recommend this compact stroller for anyone looking for a combination of ease of use, aesthetic appeal, and great customer service. It ticks all the boxes and has made my parenting journey much more enjoyable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to open and close
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love how easy this open and closes was kinda Leary on purchasing since had only 4 reviews but I’m glad I took the chance only thing I dislike is the straps the American flag colors are nice but black would of been fine the colors just look weird verses all the other ones. The wheels are a bit hard to turn in the front one handed even with both hands on the handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: a lot of travel strollers don't recline fully, this one actually does recline almost flat and baby can sleep comfy
